Observed at: Elk Island National Park 10:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
